title: Field Remedy: 1678
subject:
New P&A engines with ECU - TC P0602
(44)
complaint:
SVS on and TC P0602 (44) stored after
programming of ECU
cause:
Engines supplied from P&A are being
completed with a production ECM, which is not usable for P&A
purposes, because they are built up for the assembly plants.

remedyContent.text:
Please use the old ECM in case of an engine exchange. The new ECM coming with
the new engine has to be assembled to the old engine, which will be returned
to the warranty return center or the engine core return process.
